name: Z
description:
A blind man trying to get supply by following the sound the zombie made while avoiding it. He travels from one safe house to another. He needs to get enough supply before it runs out.
1. Left click to start the game.
2. Hold left button to move the zombie position.
3. Release left button and right click to move the character/light ball
to another safe house.
4. Collect star/timeObject to increase timer.
5. Increase timer to certain amount to win the game.
6. Timer runs out means lose.
7. Character/light ball will always move in curve motion.
